abstracts.cdata!:
The Management Response to the
            Investigation Report for the NTPC Power Generation Project
            in India summarizes the events of the Request of Inspection
            and the Management Response to the Request. The
            Investigation Report recognizes that the Bank had not fully
            complied with three operational policies: O.D. 4.30 -
            Involuntary Resettlement, O.D. 13.05 - Project Supervision;
            and O.D. 4.01 - Environmental Assessments. Management seeks
            to learn how it may respond more effectively to the problems
            raised by the Requester and to assure that Bank management
            deploys the necessary resources and skills to satisfy
            obligations in these cases. The response of Management to
            the Inspection Panel Report is to implement an Action
            Program that will closely supervise the Borrower so that
            timely adjustments can be made to resolve problems listed by
            the Requester. This program will over time reduce the
            likelihood of mistakes being repeated in the future.
